name: Altruistic Complex - Book 1 - PREORDER + Limited Edition Cover
description:
Zillford's brand new, super-packed graphic novel is almost here and you can secure your copy NOW at $5 off the regular price. Pre-order copies will also feature a limited cover available ONLY to pre-orders and Kickstarter pledgers!

Featuring 60 pages of story and loaded with extras all wrapped up in a sexy, professional, Perfectbound cover!


Terror sweeps the world, governments struggle to maintain peace and order amid plunging economies and violent uprisings. Private Military Contractors hold the guns but money tells them who to shoot. Now, of all times, it seems things can never get worse.

It can always get worse.

A new evil, born of technology that was meant to end the violence, seizes power and threatens to sunder the world as we know it. Entire armies are powerless to defeat it, is there not a shred of hope to recover?


Now, one woman must leave everything she loved behind to embrace the dangerous power of this frightening new technology. Can she become it's master, or will it consume her and condemn the world to ruin?

she is our only hope, but is she enough?



Content note - Mild language / Violence
Limited cover + discount ends Sept. 20th
Normal orders and shipping begins Oct. 1st

name: Krista Claret - Issue 3
description:
"T and A P.S.A." -16 pages-

Let's do the timewarp, friends, as we join Krista in her Senior year of high-school. Almost graduated, Almost 19, Krista is one happy girl! And when one UNhappy guy needs a friend most Krista is there to teach him the valuable, After-school-special-approved lessons of staying positive, respecting yourself, and suppressing your gag-reflex!



Krista Claret is one frisky mouse on a life-long quest for the answer to life. Either that, or a good time and some horny guys!


Content = Straight - intense oral 
NOTICE - HIGHLY ADULT - Not for anyone under 18!

name: Krista Claret - Issue 2
description:
"Tres Cliche" -14 pages-

A smokin' Russian exchange student? An endowed and willing delivery boy? SEX?!? Could it be any more cliche? au contraire! Surprises abound as Krista proves she's anything but an ordinary girl, and this is anything but an ordinary day!

Krista Claret is one frisky mouse on a life-long quest for the answer to life. Either that, or a good time and some horny guys!



This comic is also available in digital form: place an order and use the contact button on the right to email me. Give me something to link your order to your email (Your name as it appears on PayPal works best).

Content = Straight - Pegging
NOTICE - HIGHLY ADULT - Not for anyone under 18!

name: Krista Claret - Issue 1
description:
"Winning isn't Everything" -10 Pages-


There's a race to be won and Krista aims to make it hers! She's not above cheating, but what happens when it lands her *smack* on top of another rule-bender?

Krista Claret is one frisky mouse on a life-long quest for the answer to life. Either that, or a good time and some horny guys!



This comic is also available in digital form: place an order and use the contact button on the right to email me. Give me something to link your order to your email (Your name as it appears on PayPal works best).
